rules.name: myRule_15
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND (6 OR 7)
rules.label: LF CS & Not RM Lost Over 100k

Flow.description: Opportunity Email Alert - SaaS Won, All Won, Lost/Opt Out over $100K

value.stringValue: [Opportunity].Record_Type__c = "Application Managed Services" && TEXT([Opportunity].AMS_Program_Type__c) = "Uplift" && TEXT([Opportunity].StageName) = "6 - Sales Closed" && ( ISCHANGED([Opportunity].StageName) || ISNEW() )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_1
formulas.expression: {!myVariable_current.Record_Type__c} = "Application Managed Services" && TEXT({!myVariable_current.AMS_Program_Type__c}) = "Uplift" && TEXT({!myVariable_current.StageName}) = "6 - Sales Closed" && ( ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.StageName}) || ISNEW() )

Flow.label: Opportunity Email Alerts
